mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT o.*, n.nb_num, n.nb_title, n.nb_image, o_de_count FROM orderr o, newbook n, order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num AND od.nb_num = n.nb_num AND o.m_num = #{m_num} AND o.o_status IN (3, 4) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM review r WHERE r.o_order_num = o.o_order_num AND r.nb_num = n.nb_num ) order by o_order_date DESC )a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT o.*, n.nb_title, n.nb_image, o_de_count FROM orderr o, newbook n, order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num AND od.nb_num = n.nb_num AND o.m_num = #{m_num} AND o.o_status IN (3, 4) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM review r WHERE r.o_order_num = o.o_order_num AND r.nb_num = n.nb_num ) order by o_order_date DESC )

SELECT count(*) FROM review r, orderr o, newbook n, order_detail od WHERE r.o_order_num = o.o_order_num and o.m_num = #{m_num} AND r.nb_num = n.nb_num AND r.o_order_num = od.o_order_num AND r.nb_num = od.nb_num

SELECT o.o_order_num, nb.nb_title, nb.nb_image FROM order_detail od, newbook nb, orderr o WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num AND od.nb_num = nb.nb_num AND o.o_order_num = #{o_order_num} AND nb.nb_num = #{nb_num}
